article_title: Pence makes campaign stop in Anderson
article_text:
Anderson, IN (46016)

Today

More clouds than sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Ken de la Bastide | The Herald Bulletin

og.description: During a campaign stop in Anderson, Gov. Mike Pence labeled Obamacare a failed model that needs to be repealed.
